name: nikolai-monorepo
description: Nikolai Document Management System - Monorepo with API, Doc Service, and Web frontend

scripts.dev: echo 'Run npm run dev from individual apps: cd apps/api, cd apps/doc-service, or cd apps/web'
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:doc-service && npm run build:web
scripts.lint: npm run lint:api && npm run lint:doc-service && npm run lint:web
scripts.format: npm run format:api && npm run format:doc-service && npm run format:web
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:api && npm run typecheck:doc-service && npm run typecheck:web
